title: Biskra vs Ben Aknoun Prediction, Betting Tips & Odds │29 DECEMBER, 2023
text: Biskra vs Ben Aknoun Stadium-February 18 29.12.2023, 20:00 [](https://www.telecomasia.net/authors/sola-oluwasegun/) [Statistics](https://www.telecomasia.net/authors/sola-oluwasegun/) In the eleventh round of the Algerian Ligue 1 competition, the match between Biskra and Ben Aknoun will take place at the Stadium-February 18. At the beginning of this encounter, the home team has not suffered a defeat in any of their most recent matches; however, the away team is currently ranked last in the league rankings. [Get Your Sign-Up Bonus!](https://www.telecomasia.net/promobet365) Biskra In their recent matches, Biskra secured victories in 3 games against USM Khenchela, USM Alger, and MC Oran. However, two other matches ended in draws against JS Kabylie and ES Sétif, concluding with scores of 1-1 and 2-2, respectively. Across these matches, Biskra scored six goals but conceded three. On average, Biskra scored 1.11 goals per match in the current league season. Notably, Biskra faces challenges in ball possession, maintaining an average possession of 46.63% in this season. Ben Aknoun Ben Aknoun comes into this match without securing a win in their recent league games. In their last five matches, the visitors suffered three defeats against Magra, Paradou AC, and JS Kabylie, while two fixtures ended in draws against USM Khenchela and CR Belouizdad. Across these matches, Ben Aknoun managed to score two goals but conceded six. In away games, they averaged 0.44 goals scored and 1.56 goals conceded per match. The team has received 19 yellow cards and one red card due to disciplinary actions. Notably, Ben Aknoun faces challenges in ball possession, holding an average of 39.78% overall in this season. Expert Betting Tips The hosts have demonstrated quality in defense recently, remaining unbeaten in their recent matches, which serves as a significant confidence boost. Conversely, the away team has been performing below expectations, showing no signs of a potential victory. Considering these factors and Biskra's strong form at home, I am predicting them to secure a win in this match, with a likely outcome of 2-0.
